title: 2 week suspension for not even toxic text?
body: Literal two games linked and one of them wasn't even toxic the other one was just me and the enemy in all chat messing around, Literal we all added each other after that game and had fun in 1v1's, I literal don't understand why I deserve a 2 week suspension when other players are saying racist things and etc while me and the enemy team are joking around and I get a 2 week suspension.

replies.body: What was said might have been in good fun between the two of you, someone might have taken offense to what was said and reported you. I don't want to go into too much detail here on the boards due to personal info, but you're free to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get all the context as to why that suspension was placed.
